Com base em registros passados, o simula: Based on past records, the simulator will accelerate the stock variation for learning purposes.
A Watchlist é uma lista personalizada de: The Watchlist is a personalized list of assets you want to track frequently.
Como usar as ferramentas de simulação?: How to use the simulation tools?
Acesse a aba \"Simulador\", selecione os: Go to the 'Simulator' tab, select the desired assets and set the conditions to start the simulation.
Onde posso buscar mais ajuda?: Where can I find more help?
Para buscar ajuda sobre algo específico,: To get help with something specific, scroll down to the bottom of the page to find our email.
